title: 5m0k3 Module
desc:
Post 837
- Can only be played with <:weapon:1107519313075785768> cards.
- When played, the <:weapon:1107519313075785768> gains a smoke grenade on top of it, making 3 of the target’s cards turn <:yellow:1106234135384699023> and revealing all of their <:yellow:1106234135384699023> cards to you.
- if the card is one of the 5 that dont target a player because Hyper forgot <:weapon:1107519313075785768>s are supposed to harm other players, this cant be used on that weapon.
